body_html:
I think we would like to switch to using std::int64_t, but this would be a big effort, and include changes to much of the C++ code using TensorFlow, not just TensorFlow itself. This may happen as part of switching to https://github.com/abseil/abseil-cpp, assuming they also use (or switch to) std::int64_t.
@martinwicke

body:
I think we would like to switch to using std::int64_t, but this would be a big effort, and include changes to much of the C++ code using TensorFlow, not just TensorFlow itself. This may happen as part of switching to https://github.com/abseil/abseil-cpp, assuming they also use (or switch to) std::int64_t.
@martinwicke
